Y-you-----!"},{"lineNumber":318,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボクは騎士だと何度も…………くっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've told you many times that I'm a knight... ugh!?\""},{"lineNumber":319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはサーナキアを強引に抱き寄せた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance forcibly pulled Sarnakia close."},{"lineNumber":320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ、や、こら、やめろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, stop...\""},{"lineNumber":321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、復活してきた。さあもう一発だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, you're back. It's a direct order from the Supreme Commander."},{"lineNumber":325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の方が偉い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm the one who's more important!\""},{"lineNumber":326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きっ、貴様、ッ……！　そ、そこはっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you, you...! Th-there...!\""},{"lineNumber":327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっ、んんっ、だ、だめっ……ああぁぁっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, nnngh, n-no... aaaaah...!\""},{"lineNumber":328,"originalJapaneseLine":"結局サーナキアは、翌朝になって","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, Sarnakia was scolded thoroughly by the troops the next morning."},{"lineNumber":329,"originalJapaneseLine":"団員達から散々に文句を言われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The members complained to her harshly."},{"lineNumber":330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザス赤の軍副将、メナド・シセイです！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am Menado Shisei, Vice General of the Red Army of Riezas!"},{"lineNumber":331,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その…………よろしくね、ランス総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um... pleased to meet you, Supreme Commander Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、じゃあ今夜はお前だな、チルディ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, then tonight it's your turn, Childi!\""},{"lineNumber":333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ……困りますわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah... this is troubling."},{"lineNumber":334,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これでも忙しい…………あら」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm quite busy even so... oh?"},{"lineNumber":335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お？　よう、メナドか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Hey, Menado.\""},{"lineNumber":337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お疲れ様ですっ、ランス総統……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-good work, Supreme Commander Rance...!\""},{"lineNumber":338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、変な呼び方して。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's with the strange way of addressing me?"},{"lineNumber":339,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほれ、こっちこい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, over here.\""},{"lineNumber":340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ、で、でも……っ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, a-are, but...\""},{"lineNumber":341,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そ、そそ、そういうのは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Th-th-those kinds of things...\""},{"lineNumber":342,"originalJapaneseLine":"メナドは挙動不審になって、あわあわ戸惑った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Menado became jittery and flustered, confused."},{"lineNumber":343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、そういえば再会してからしてなかったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufun, now that you mention it, we haven't done this since we met again."},{"lineNumber":344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　久しぶりに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's do it after a long time...\""},{"lineNumber":345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっ、失礼しますッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-excuse me!\""},{"lineNumber":346,"originalJapaneseLine":"真っ赤になりながら一礼すると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Blushing deeply, she bowed and then"},{"lineNumber":347,"originalJapaneseLine":"メナドはすごい勢いで駆け去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Menado hurried away at a great speed."},{"lineNumber":348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだあいつ。逃げやがった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What was that? She ran away.\""},{"lineNumber":349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……メナド副将と、お知り合いでしたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... were you acquainted with Vice General Menado?\""},{"lineNumber":350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「昔にちょっとな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A little back in the day.\""},{"lineNumber":351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……ずいぶんとその、親しげな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... you seem quite close...\""},{"lineNumber":352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、聞くだけ野暮だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, it's pointless even asking.\""},{"lineNumber":353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あからさまに騙されてるじゃありませんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Clearly, you're being deceived...\""},{"lineNumber":354,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああぁぁ……まさか、あのメナド副将まで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahhh... No way, even Vice General Menado...\""},{"lineNumber":355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ。あいつ有名人なのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? Is she famous or something?\""},{"lineNumber":356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃもう。一警備兵からの叩き上げで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course. She rose through the ranks from a simple guard,"},{"lineNumber":357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤の軍に入って数年で、","translatedEnglishLine":"joined the Red Army and in just a few years,"},{"lineNumber":358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　副将にまで昇り詰めてしまった方ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she climbed all the way up to Vice General.\""},{"lineNumber":359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「性格も、驕らず明るく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Her personality is humble and bright..."},{"lineNumber":360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック将軍の補佐から部下の世話までこなす、","translatedEnglishLine":"From assisting General Rick to taking care of subordinates,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の身体を、食い物のように……」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A woman's body, like something to devour..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ。それにサーナキアも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gufufu. And then there's Sarnakia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこそこ抱いてきていい感じになってきたしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've been getting along well enough that I've held her a fair number of times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何回かイッてただろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She came several times, didn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぅっ、ぐ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Auh, gu...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そんなことは……な、ない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that's not... true!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、初めこそ抵抗するが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, though she resists at first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに入ったらあんあんといい声を上げるし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: once in bed, she makes such good sounds."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く……口に、するな……そういう、ことを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kuh... don't speak of... such things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは。うん。女らしくなった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha. Yeah. You've become more womanly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （そうだ……だんだん……嫌じゃなくなってる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That's right... gradually... I don't hate it anymore...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、こいつも上手くなって、前ほどには……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, she's gotten better too, so it's not like before...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何も自分を卑下することはないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to belittle yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし騎士としてダメダメでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you are useless as a knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娼婦としてはやってける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you can make it as a prostitute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、っ……！？　き、貴様ーーーー！
ボクは騎士だと何度も…………くっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've told you many times that I'm a knight... ugh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはサーナキアを強引に抱き寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance forcibly pulled Sarnakia close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……っ、や、こら、やめろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、復活してきた。さあもう一発だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, you're back. Now, one more round."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……も、もうだめだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I-I can't anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜番の交代の時間だ。団長がサボるわけには……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's time to change the night watch. The captain can't slack off..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメだダメだ！　総統命令だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no! It's a direct order from the Supreme Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の方が偉い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the one who's more important!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっ、貴様、ッ……！　そ、そこはっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you, you...! Th-there...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、んんっ、だ、だめっ……ああぁぁっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, nnngh, n-no... aaaaah...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局サーナキアは、翌朝になって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, Sarnakia was scolded thoroughly by the troops the next morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 団員達から散々に文句を言われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The members complained to her harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス赤の軍副将、メナド・シセイです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am Menado Shisei, Vice General of the Red Army of Riezas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その…………よろしくね、ランス総統」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... pleased to meet you, Supreme Commander Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、じゃあ今夜はお前だな、チルディ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, then tonight it's your turn, Childi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……困りますわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haah... this is troubling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでも忙しい…………あら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm quite busy even so... oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お？　よう、メナドか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Hey, Menado."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お疲れ様ですっ、ランス総統……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-good work, Supreme Commander Rance...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、変な呼び方して。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's with the strange way of addressing me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほれ、こっちこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, over here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、あ、で、でも……っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, a-are, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そそ、そういうのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-th-those kinds of things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドは挙動不審になって、あわあわ戸惑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado became jittery and flustered, confused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、そういえば再会してからしてなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fufun, now that you mention it, we haven't done this since we met again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しぶりに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's do it after a long time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、失礼しますッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "E-excuse me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真っ赤になりながら一礼すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blushing deeply, she bowed and then

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドはすごい勢いで駆け去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado hurried away at a great speed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだあいつ。逃げやがった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was that? She ran away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……メナド副将と、お知り合いでしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... were you acquainted with Vice General Menado?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔にちょっとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A little back in the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……ずいぶんとその、親しげな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... you seem quite close..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、聞くだけ野暮だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, it's pointless even asking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あからさまに騙されてるじゃありませんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Clearly, you're being deceived..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああぁぁ……まさか、あのメナド副将まで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahhh... No way, even Vice General Menado..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ。あいつ有名人なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? Is she famous or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃもう。一警備兵からの叩き上げで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. She rose through the ranks from a simple guard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍に入って数年で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: joined the Red Army and in just a few years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将にまで昇り詰めてしまった方ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she climbed all the way up to Vice General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「性格も、驕らず明るく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her personality is humble and bright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍の補佐から部下の世話までこなす、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From assisting General Rick to taking care of subordinates,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

She rose through the ranks from a simple guard,"},{"lineNumber":357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤の軍に入って数年で、","translatedEnglishLine":"joined the Red Army and in just a few years,"},{"lineNumber":358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　副将にまで昇り詰めてしまった方ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she climbed all the way up to Vice General.\""},{"lineNumber":359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「性格も、驕らず明るく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Her personality is humble and bright..."},{"lineNumber":360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リック将軍の補佐から部下の世話までこなす、","translatedEnglishLine":"From assisting General Rick to taking care of subordinates,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の身体を、食い物のように……」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A woman's body, like something to devour..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ。それにサーナキアも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gufufu. And then there's Sarnakia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこそこ抱いてきていい感じになってきたしな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've been getting along well enough that I've held her a fair number of times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何回かイッてただろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She came several times, didn't she?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぅっ、ぐ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Auh, gu...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そんなことは……な、ない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that's not... true!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに、初めこそ抵抗するが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, though she resists at first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに入ったらあんあんといい声を上げるし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: once in bed, she makes such good sounds."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く……口に、するな……そういう、ことを……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kuh... don't speak of... such things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは。うん。女らしくなった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha. Yeah. You've become more womanly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （そうだ……だんだん……嫌じゃなくなってる……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That's right... gradually... I don't hate it anymore...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、こいつも上手くなって、前ほどには……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, she's gotten better too, so it's not like before...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何も自分を卑下することはないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to belittle yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし騎士としてダメダメでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you are useless as a knight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 娼婦としてはやってける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you can make it as a prostitute."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、っ……！？　き、貴様ーーーー！
ボクは騎士だと何度も…………くっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've told you many times that I'm a knight... ugh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはサーナキアを強引に抱き寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance forcibly pulled Sarnakia close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……っ、や、こら、やめろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hey, stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、復活してきた。さあもう一発だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, you're back. Now, one more round."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……も、もうだめだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I-I can't anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜番の交代の時間だ。団長がサボるわけには……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's time to change the night watch. The captain can't slack off..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ダメだダメだ！　総統命令だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no! It's a direct order from the Supreme Commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の方が偉い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm the one who's more important!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっ、貴様、ッ……！　そ、そこはっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you, you...! Th-there...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、んんっ、だ、だめっ……ああぁぁっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, nnngh, n-no... aaaaah...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局サーナキアは、翌朝になって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, Sarnakia was scolded thoroughly by the troops the next morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 団員達から散々に文句を言われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The members complained to her harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス赤の軍副将、メナド・シセイです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am Menado Shisei, Vice General of the Red Army of Riezas!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その…………よろしくね、ランス総統」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Um... pleased to meet you, Supreme Commander Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、じゃあ今夜はお前だな、チルディ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, then tonight it's your turn, Childi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……困りますわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haah... this is troubling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これでも忙しい…………あら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm quite busy even so... oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お？　よう、メナドか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Hey, Menado."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お疲れ様ですっ、ランス総統……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-good work, Supreme Commander Rance...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、変な呼び方して。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's with the strange way of addressing me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほれ、こっちこい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, over here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、あ、で、でも……っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, a-are, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そそ、そういうのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-th-those kinds of things..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドは挙動不審になって、あわあわ戸惑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado became jittery and flustered, confused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、そういえば再会してからしてなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fufun, now that you mention it, we haven't done this since we met again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しぶりに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's do it after a long time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、失礼しますッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "E-excuse me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真っ赤になりながら一礼すると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Blushing deeply, she bowed and then

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メナドはすごい勢いで駆け去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Menado hurried away at a great speed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだあいつ。逃げやがった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What was that? She ran away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの……メナド副将と、お知り合いでしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... were you acquainted with Vice General Menado?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昔にちょっとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A little back in the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……ずいぶんとその、親しげな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... you seem quite close..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、聞くだけ野暮だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, it's pointless even asking."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あからさまに騙されてるじゃありませんか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Clearly, you're being deceived..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああぁぁ……まさか、あのメナド副将まで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahhh... No way, even Vice General Menado..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ。あいつ有名人なのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What? Is she famous or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃもう。一警備兵からの叩き上げで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course. She rose through the ranks from a simple guard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤の軍に入って数年で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: joined the Red Army and in just a few years,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 副将にまで昇り詰めてしまった方ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she climbed all the way up to Vice General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「性格も、驕らず明るく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her personality is humble and bright...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リック将軍の補佐から部下の世話までこなす、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From assisting General Rick to taking care of subordinates,
